item.title: Python Regex
item.description: In Python, regular expressions are a tool used to locate certain characters, and be able to edit them. This can be useful in data science applications for example, to locate strings and standardize them. library(reticulate) import pandas import re A useful first function to know is re.findall() into which you input your target expression and the string you want to be searched. It exports a list of strings, with every string being a located match.
